item.title: How to Help Bullying Victims
item.description: What’s the most crushing thing about being bullied? It’s not what most people think it is. Blue close to victims of bullying are often not aware of the emotional burden they carry. For example, a study of over 7,000 students, found that victims of bullying reported internalising symptoms including frequent worries, sadness, nervousness, and fearfulness (Peskin et al., 2007). In a recent cross continental study of 317,869 adolescents 30.5% experienced bullying victimisation in the past 30 days (Biswas et al.
